soccer.common

Class RefereeData

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.RefereeData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Data

    public class RefereeData
extends java.lang.Object
implements Data
    Provides referee data for server informing all clients.
    Author:
    Yu Zhang modifications by Vadim Kyrylov (2004-2010)

    • Field Detail

      • periods

        public static final java.lang.String[] periods
        play period string array for displaying. periods[PRE_GAME] = "preGame", periods[FIRST_HALF] = "firstHalf", periods[HALF_TIME] = "halfTime", periods[SECOND_HALF] = "secondHalf".
